diff_hunk:
@@ -180,13 +183,12 @@ else
   TF_NEED_JEMALLOC=0
 fi
 
-if [ "$TF_NEED_JEMALLOC" == "1" ]; then
-  sed_hyphen_i -e "s/WITH_JEMALLOC = False/WITH_JEMALLOC = True/" tensorflow/core/platform/default/build_config.bzl
-else
-  sed_hyphen_i -e "s/WITH_JEMALLOC = True/WITH_JEMALLOC = False/" tensorflow/core/platform/default/build_config.bzl
+sed_hyphen_i -e "/with_jemalloc/d" .bazelrc
+if [[ "$TF_NEED_JEMALLOC" == "1" ]]; then
+  echo 'build --define with_jemalloc=true' >>.bazelrc
 fi
 
-while [ "$TF_NEED_GCP" == "" ]; do
+while [[ "$TF_NEED_GCP" == "" ]]; do
body: `[[` is bash builtin syntax whereas `[` is a literal command line program that needs to be spawned.
body_html: [[ is bash builtin syntax whereas [ is a literal command line program that needs to be spawned.
body_text: [[ is bash builtin syntax whereas [ is a literal command line program that needs to be spawned.
